column4: Hi, my onboard USB stopped working suddenly =[ Can anyone help me troubleshoot?
They show up in windows device manager as working fine
No, I checked, I thought it may have been a Win Update at first but none
so usb ' es does NOT run from WIN7?
I updated the bios after it stopped working, thinking that might fix it
The only USB setting in the bios is the legacy one, and that's been set to enabled always
Ok, I'm going to try that BRB
can you assume for sure that key IS bootable?
You mean can I boot from USB?
Hmm, I'll try that, I have a ubuntu live image somewhere
Yeah, if it won't boot I'm just gonna take it to BestBuy, the laptop should still be under warranty
Off to make that boot usb, we'll see
i would have done the same
